_header: In our gospel Saint Luke us leres / No man be proud…
_description: Gospel for Eleventh Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: In oure godspel saint luke vs leresNo man be prowd vntill his peres…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …ffor so ane hermite sumtyme wendAls by a tale here may be kend
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dixit ihesu crist ad quosdam.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica xi estatis secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 108vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.55-57.
